section.title:
item sites thawing by class code
item sites thawing by warehouse
thawing of item sites
physical inventory thawing item sites Thaw Item Sites by Class Code/Warehouse
section.para: To thaw previously frozen Item Sites by Class Code and Warehouse, select the "Thaw Item Sites by Class Code Warehouse" option. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Thaw Item Sites by Class Code/Warehouse

note.para: For a detailed explanation of freezing and thawing, see .

section.para: When thawing previously frozen Item Sites by Class Code and Warehouse, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to thaw Item Sites by Warehouse for all Class Codes.
Specify Class Code whose Item Sites by Warehouse you want to thaw.
Enter a Class Code pattern to select a range of Class Codes. Refine your search using Regular Expressions, as described in .
Specify Warehouse whose Item Sites are to be thawed.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without thawing previously frozen Item Sites, returning you to the application desktop.
Thaws previously frozen Item Sites by specified Class Code(s) and Warehouse. For a detailed explanation of these concepts, see .
